cleaned_text: Description - USDA Organic - Unplug & Recharge - Certified Organic Essential Oil Blend - CTEO - Chemotyped Essential Oils - Certified Organic by Ecocert ICO We harness the active properties of organic plants as essential oils for health and wellness. Each lot is GC/MS (gas chromatography, mass spectrometry) tested and chemotyped for purity. Absolutely - No GMOs - No Synthetics - No Additives - No Adulterants - No Animal Testing Suggested use Diffusing Instructions Add 3-4drops in an ultrasonic diffuser with water.
